title: Drawing, "Design for a Cup", 1936
medium: Pen and black ink, red color pencil, and graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: COUPE; lower right: J.P./36/(square root sign)5; in red pencil, lower center right: Tout Argent [underlined twice].
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Tall cylindrical silver vase with flared mouth drawn in plan and elevation. Lower third of cup with ten stacked segmented rings. Red pencil inscription indicates this area to be executed in "all silver." Cup is raised on a thick round foot. Underdrawing in pen and black ink and graphite of cup in golden.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Cup", 1936.
1936. Pen and black ink, red color pencil, and graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-15.
